title: Local Restaurant Group Announces Support for Conservative Municipal Candidates
summary: A well-known New Braunfels restaurant group publicly announced donations to multiple conservative candidates in the upcoming municipal election, drawing both praise and criticism on social media.

title: Gruene Area Shop Displays Pride Flag, Sparks Local Debate
summary: A retail shop in the Gruene Historic District began displaying a pride flag, prompting a social media debate among local residents about businesses taking social stances in a conservative community.

title: Greater New Braunfels Chamber Announces 2026 Municipal Election Endorsements
summary: The Greater New Braunfels Chamber of Commerce released its endorsement list for the 2026 municipal election, backing candidates who support business-friendly development policies.
